name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader.”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem.”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to tell me a Haiku.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
A Haiku is a short poem and the skill "Haiku Reader" offers to read random Haikus to the user.

A user could say: 

Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to tell me a Haiku.

Alexa would respond:

I have a Haiku for you:
The last page is full.
Scribbled notes and reminders.
Goodbye dear notebook.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
